ElectronicText.textData: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <forms xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://ofbiz.apache.org/Widget-Form" xsi:schemaLocation="http://ofbiz.apache.org/Widget-Form http://ofbiz.apache.org/dtds/widget-form.xsd"> <form name="CTNT_MASTER_EXAMPLE_OVERRIDE" type="single" target="editFormParameters" extends="CTNT_MASTER_EXAMPLE" extends-resource="component://birt/widget/birt/BirtMasterForms.xml"> <field name="overrideFilters" title="${uiLabelMap.overrideFilters}"><textarea cols="90" rows="20" default-value="${parameters.textForm}"/></field> <field name="reportContentId"><hidden value="${parameters.reportContentId}"/></field> <on-event-update-area event-type="submit" area-id="window" area-target="manageReports"> <parameter param-name="contentId" value="${parameters.reportContentId}"/> </on-event-update-area> <sort-order><sort-field name="overrideFilters"/></sort-order> </form> </forms>
